name: Jewel Quest - Magic Match3
description:
An addictive and exciting adventure puzzle game filled with colorful jewels and satisfying effects!


Unlock thousands of levels, train your brain and become a jewel master!


How to play?
- Match 3 or more jewels in a line to crush them.
- Match 4 jewels to create special rocket jewels. They will blast all the jewels in a row or column.
- Match 5 jewels with T or L shape to create special jewels bomb. The jewels bomb destroys all jewels around it.
- Match 5 jewels in a line to create the mega magic jewel and destroy all jewels with the same color of selected jewels .
- Combine 2 special jewels together to make an amazing combo to help you pass the level.



FEATURES
- Easy and fun to play
- More than 2000 levels
- Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
- Reach higher score to obtain more stars
- Discover and use powerful bonus bubbles
- Play without connection, whenever and wherever you want
- No energy, no pressure



Play for FREE and enjoy an awesome matching brain puzzle with unique gameplay and addicting quests!
